data.actual_result: The client saves the status bar's current status, as you start the video, and shows it throughout the whole video, and if you click on the video, to view the timeline, you will notice there are two different bars. [Best seen on videos shot on a phone in portrait mode (see attachment)]
data.expected_result: There should only be ONE status bar shown.
data.short_description: Viewing a video in the In-App Browser, makes a copy of the status bar [Might be iOS 10 only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your Web Browser settings are set to In-App Browser - Send a video in a text channel (about a minute or two in length) - Watch the video, in fullscreen/maximized - Make changes to the status bar (put your phone to power, disconnect from Wi-Fi or wait a minute) - Observe the status bar
